name: Red Mary
instruction: In shaker with ice, shake well and strain into large tumbler.

name: Reform Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass with Cherry.

name: Remsen Cooler
instruction: Place lemon rind in large tumbler, add ice, whisky, and fill with soda water.

name: Rhin et Danube
instruction: Stir and serve in a frosted cocktail glass with lemon peel.

name: Riviera
note: Recipe by Michel Filippi, Casino de la Mediterranée, Nice.

name: Rob Roy Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass with Cherry.

name: Rock and Rye
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Rock Candy Syrup or Gomme Syrup
instruction: Stir together and serve in same glass with squeezed Lemon Peel.

name: Rose Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass with Cherry.

name: Royal Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass with Cherry.
note: Recipe by Otis Mackinney, Hotel Royal, Nice, 1908.

name: Royal Fizz Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into medium-sized tumbler. Fill balance with syphon.

name: Royal Smile Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into small wineglass.

name: Ruby Fizz
instruction: Shake well and strain into medium-sized tumbler. Fill balance with Ginger Ale.
note: Recipe by Wm. Yarrow, McDonagh Bros., San Francisco.

name: Russ House Cocktail
note: Recipe by Ed. V. Orsinger, Hotel Columbus, Harrisburg, Pa.
